name: Wait... Wait.. BANG!
description:
Be the first to pull the trigger
Shoot too early, and you die.
Shoot too late, and you die.

First to five points Wins!

Controls:

  • "A" key for the left player
  •  "L" key for the right player

PLEASE NOTE: This game is a clone of the original "Ready Steady BANG"

find out more about the original at https://animade.tv/projects/cowboy-games

I am not affiliated with animade studios. All assets are my own interpretation of theirs.
